fieldGroup.template: Please describe the conditions for rehoming or reintegration into a suitable habitat or husbandry system.

In order for an animal that has been used in experimentation to be kept alive, the conditions described in article 30 of Royal Decree 53/2013 are to be met:

  • a) That your state of health allows it.
  • b) That it does not pose a danger to public health, animal health or the environment.
  • c) That appropriate measures have been taken to safeguard the good condition of the animal.
  • d) That in the case of rehoming or adoption, breeders, suppliers and users have a suitable programme that guarantees their socialization.
  • e) That in the case of release of wild animals in their habitat, a suitable adaptation programme is available.
